films.title: Legend of the Seeker
films.description: After the mysterious murder of his father, a son's search for answers begins a momentous fight against tyranny.

films.title: Gnomebook
films.description: A colourful array of characters compete at the Annual Australian Garden Gnome Convention. Once a year 2000 garden gnomes and 10,000 gnome carers gather in the sleepy mountain hamlet of Glenbrook, for the annual Gnome convention; the gnomes arrive by road, train, plane, foot and post

films.title: Rise of the Legend
films.description: RISE OF THE LEGEND is a story about Lee Chong Wei, who was born in a poor family. He has the talent of playing badminton and went through a lot of difficulties with the spirit of never giving up, finally he becomes a national player.

films.title: Siji: Driver
films.description: After a driver rescues a passenger from an abusive boyfriend, he discovers she is a human trafficking victim. But in order to free her, he must give up the thing he loves the most.
